channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Fuite de données à l’Urssaf : les informations de 1,2 million de salariés ont été piratées sur Pajemploi
item.description: Géré par l'Urssaf, le service public Pajemploi a été victime d'une cyberattaque. Les données personnelles de plus d’1,2 million d’utilisateurs ont été potentiellement compromises.

item.title: L’autonomie de ces voitures électriques ne diminue pas, même après 3 ans d’utilisation
item.description: Bonne nouvelle pour les automobilistes qui hésitent encore à franchir le cap : une nouvelle étude confirme que les batteries des voitures électriques affichent une longévité qui devrait rassurer les plus sceptiques, avec des taux de remplacement qui restent confidentiels en dehors des toutes premières générations de véhicules électriques.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs smartphones pliables ? Samsung Galaxy Z, Honor Magic, Motorola Razr… le comparatif
item.description: Les smartphones pliants envahissent le marché. Très compacts une fois refermés, ils déploient de grands écrans pour une expérience visuelle plus agréable. Découvrez ici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles pliables, testés et approuvés par nos soins.

item.title: Jeff Bezos reportedly returns to the trenches as co-CEO of new AI startup, Project Prometheus
item.description: Amazon's founder Jeff Bezos seems to be getting his hands dirty once again: the billionaire is partly backing a new AI startup called Project Prometheus that has raised $6.2 billion in funding, and will take on duties as co-chief executive.

item.title: Black Friday audio : les écouteurs Bluetooth, casques, barres de son et enceintes montent le volume et baissent leur prix dans ce top des offres
item.description: Écouteurs Bluetooth, casques audio sans-fil, enceintes Bluetooth, plusieurs produits audio regroupent cette catégorie. Nous avons sélectionné les meilleures offres du secteur. Vous y trouverez des AirPods, des produits JBL ou encore des casques de chez Sony.

item.title: Solos AirGo A5 Review: These AI Smart Glasses Need a Brain Transplant
item.description: The built-in AI in these camera-less smart glasses needs a lot more work.

item.title: La Boîte Sosh VS RED Box : quelle est la meilleure offre internet low-cost pour faire des économies sans perdre en débits ?
item.description: Nés peu après l'incursion de Free sur le marché des télécoms, Sosh et RED by SFR sont les opérateurs low-cost les plus populaires du marché qui se sont rapidement démarqués avec leurs forfaits pas chers et sans engagement, autant sur le fixe que sur le mobile. Justement, sur le fixe, voyons lequel des deux a la meilleure proposition.

item.title: Here’s Your First Official Look at the ‘Legend of Zelda’ Movie
item.description: 'The Legend of Zelda' movie recently went into production, and Nintendo casually revealed the first live-action Zelda and Link.

item.title: CMF Headphone Pro : le nouveau casque de Nothing avec 100h d’autonomie chute déjà sous les 70 € grâce au pré-Black Friday
item.description: Il a une autonomie record, des coussinets personnalisables, la réduction de bruit adaptative... Et il est très peu onéreux. Voici le tout nouveau CMF Headphone Pro, qu'Amazon affiche à 69 euros au lieu de 99 euros pendant l'avant-première du Black Friday.

item.title: MSNBC’s website is now MS.NOW
item.description: A few months after announcing its big name change, MSNBC is getting a new domain featuring its new name: ms.now. It features essentially the same layout as the old MSNBC website, but with a fresh coat of paint, including the new MS NOW flag logo — the old MSNBC peacock is gone. The new website […]

item.title: « Nous avons encore beaucoup de travail à faire » : Microsoft admet que Windows 11 est un chantier
item.description: Le patron de Windows vient de se prendre un mur de critiques. Sa réaction ? Désactiver les commentaires, puis revenir avec des excuses. Pendant ce temps, l'Explorateur de fichiers rame, le Gestionnaire des tâches fuit de la RAM, et les mises à jour de sécurité refusent de s'installer.

item.title: Don't Donate Torn, Stained Clothes and Sheets—Send Them to Trashie
item.description: Recycling isn’t just for glass and paper anymore. This mail-order clothes recycling program lets you earn points for old textiles and e-waste.

item.title: Luminal raises $5.3 million to build a better GPU code framework
item.description: Inference optimization startup Luminal has announced $5.3 million in a seed funding round led by Felicis Ventures, with angel investment from Paul Graham, Guillermo Rauch and Ben Porterfield.

item.title: Logitech confirms data breach - but says it isn't sure exactly what information was lost
item.description: Logitech is playing down the importance of the breach, but victims are speaking out.

item.title: You can now buy pre-owned Ford vehicles on Amazon
item.description: Ford will be the next automaker to allow its vehicles to be featured on Amazon’s new online car buying site. Starting today, customers can browse, finance, and purchase certified pre-owned Ford vehicles online through Amazon Autos, with in-person pickup at a local Ford dealership. Ford is the second brand name, after Hyundai, to list its […]

item.title: MCP AI agent security startup Runlayer launches with 8 unicorns, $11M from Khosla’s Keith Rabois and Felicis
item.description: Three-time founder Andrew Berman is back with a startup that helps IT ensure business users' AI agents operate securely.

item.title: What is the release date for The Mighty Nein episodes 1 to 3 on Prime Video?
item.description: The Mighty Nein is the next Critical Role campaign to be adapted for Prime Video – here's when it'll make its debut.

item.title: Steam Machine : le « faux » HDMI 2.0 cache une vraie 4K 120 Hz
item.description: Après plusieurs interrogations sur la présence d’un port HDMI 2.0 sur la Steam Machine, Valve nous a répondu pour mettre fin au mystère. L'un des architectes de SteamOS explique que le matériel supporte bien le HDMI 2.1 et que les limites observées proviennent uniquement du logiciel. Il confirme qu’un affichage 4K 120 Hz est bien possible.

item.title: Quantum Computing Inc: Stock price soars on earnings beat in volatile year for quantum stocks
item.description: Shares are up by double digits in premarket trading on Monday after QUBT reported better-than-expected revenue. Will it last? As of this writing, shares in Quantum Computing Inc. (Nasdaq: QUBT) are spiking in premarket trading, with the stock price up over 15%. That’s a relatively large swing, even for a quantum computing firm, where stocks have been especially volatile this year. Here’s what to know:...

item.title: Ahead of Black Friday, the DualSense has dropped to its lowest price since September
item.description: Upgrade your gaming with the PS5 DualSense’s adaptive triggers as a pre Black Friday deal drops it to its lowest price since September.

item.title: How to watch Summerwater on Channel 4 — it's *FREE*
item.description: Katherine Kelley stars in this gripping six-part crime thriller, and our guide explains how to watch In Flight online now and free from anywhere.

item.title: The Garmin Epix Pro (Gen 2) is my marathon companion of choice, and it's 50% off in the early Black Friday sales
item.description: Why wait for Black Friday? This Garmin Epix Pro (Gen 2) 50% off deal isn't going to get any better.

item.title: The DJI Pocket 3 vlogging camera gets a huge discount as rumors of its successor ramp up
item.description: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 falls from $799 to just $528 at Amazon ahead of the Black Friday deals.

item.title: Apple pourrait mettre à la retraite un de ses Mac les plus emblématiques
item.description: Un petit tour et puis s'en va ? Le Mac Pro, relancé en 2023 avec une puce Apple (la M2 Ultra), n'a plus été mis à jour depuis. La grande tour d'Apple pourrait laisser complètement sa place au Mac Studio, déjà plus puissant avec sa M3 Ultra.

item.title: Surveillance tech provider Protei was hacked, its data stolen and its website defaced
item.description: The defacement of Protei's website said "another DPI/SORM provider bites the dust," apparently referring to the company selling its web intercept and surveillance products to phone and internet providers.

item.title: L’objet venu d’ailleurs 3I/Atlas est-il une sonde extraterrestre ? Voici ce qu'indique un réseau mondial de télescopes
item.description: Il existe un réseau mondial grandissant d'astronomes citoyens possesseurs d'un eVscope, dont les observations peuvent être combinées pour faire des découvertes en astronomie. Nul besoin d'être un astronome professionnel pour y contribuer, comme le montre l'application de ce réseau pour tenter de...

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 17, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for November 17, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for November 17, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1611 on November 17 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: 9 Best Robot Vacuums (2025): Tested and Reviewed in Real Homes
item.description: Whether you’re up against pet hair or you want to splurge on a high-end laser-guided robot vacuum, we have the perfect pick for you.

item.title: James Gunn Clarifies a Few Things About the Jimmy Olsen TV Show
item.description: Plus, somehow they're making a Labubu movie.

item.title: Don't wait for Black Friday when you can get one of the best Switch controllers - and a free carry case - for less right now
item.description: The 8BitDo Ultimate is the best Nintendo Switch controller, and ahead of Black Friday it's enjoying a tremendous discount.

item.title: Mint Mobile’s Black Friday Deal Makes Samsung, Google, and Apple Phones Practically Free With Its 50% Off Unlimited Plan
item.description: Massive holiday savings are available on Samsung's flagship S25 phones, the Google Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Apple's iPhone 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max.

item.title: Bone AI raises $12M to challenge Asia’s defense giants with AI-powered robotics
item.description: Bone AI, a South Korean startup, is combining AI and manufacturing to build next-gen defense robotics and challenge the region’s industry giants.

item.title: Don’t panic: Netflix stock didn’t drop 90%. NFLX shares just split
item.description: The TV streaming giant has executed a previously announced 10-for-1 stock split to make shares more accessible to its employees. Here’s what to know. Unsuspecting Netflix (Nasdaq: NFLX) investors might be startled this morning if they glance at a stock price chart for shares in the TV streamer.

item.title: AirPods Pro 2 are down to a new record-low price, and I'd choose them over the AirPods Pro 3 this Black Friday
item.description: Apple's earbuds hit a new low price in both the UK and US, which makes them a better value than the newer model

item.title: How to transition to a new industry without starting over
item.description: Experts offer their advice on how to change careers. Transitioning to a new industry often seems like a daunting prospect if you feel like you have to start from scratch, but that’s not necessarily the case. There are numerous strategies you can employ to navigate career changes, including translating existing achievements into relevant terms, finding unique opportunity gaps, and leveraging transferable skills in meaningful ways. Take it from professionals who have personally experienced this transition (or have helped others through it): you can build forward from experience rather than start...
